Package org.wmn4j.notation

Class GraceNote

java.lang.Object
org.wmn4j.notation.GraceNote
All Implemented Interfaces:
Notation.Connectable, OptionallyPitched, Ornamental
public final class GraceNote extends Object implements OptionallyPitched, Ornamental, Notation.Connectable
Represents a grace note.

This class is immutable.

      Returns an instance with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      pitch - the pitch of the grace note
      displayableDuration - the displayable duration of the grace note
      articulations - a set of Articulations associated with the grace note
      notationConnections - connections to other elements through notations
      ornaments - ornaments for the grace note
      techniques - playing techniques of the grace note
      type - the type of this grace note
